name: Desktop Sex Doll
description:
Have you ever wanted to have an attractive girl dancing on your screen while you are doing something at the computer?

With the game Desktop Sex Doll it is quite possible. You can make her such that you will like it, dress her in different outfits or leave her without it 😉, choose a dance that will turn you on.

With the help of additional games you can gradually open up new possibilities in the behavior of your doll, and by turning on your favorite music in the background you can even dance with her 🤩

Features:
  • Different styles of the heroine's dance
  • A large selection of settings for the heroine
  • Minigames
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
